mapper.select:
select t.title ,t.id,t.intro,t.id,now() as now,m.material_name, DATE_FORMAT(t.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as end_date, DATE_FORMAT(b.gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as gmt_create from material_survey t left join material_survey_question_answer b on b.survey_id=t.id and b.user_id=#{parameter.id} left join material m on m.id = t.material_id where 1 = 1
and b.gmt_create is not NULL
and b.gmt_create is NULL
and t.type_id != 1 GROUP BY t.id limit ${start},${pageSize}
select count(*) from ( select id from material_survey where material_id is null and type_id != 1 )q

select t.title as survey_title, b.title as question_title, o.option_content, b.type from material_survey t left join material_survey_question b on b.survey_id=t.id left join material_survey_question_option o on o.question_id=b.id where t.id='1'

select t.id,t.title,a.gmt_create,max(a.gmt_create),t.required_for_material from material_survey t left join material_survey_question_answer a on a.survey_id=t.id and a.user_id=#{user_id} where t.material_id=#{material_id} and t.all_textbook_used=1 and t.type_id != 1 group by a.survey_id

select b.id,b.title,max(t.required),t.required,a.gmt_create from material_survey_chain t left join material_survey b on t.material_survey_id=b.id left join material_survey_question_answer a on a.survey_id=b.id and a.user_id=#{user_id} where t.textbook_id in ${textbook_id} and b.all_textbook_used=0 and b.type_id != 1 group by b.id

select t.title,t.id,max(t.id),a.gmt_create from material_survey t left join material_survey_question_answer a on a.survey_id=t.id and a.user_id=#{user_id} where t.material_id=#{material_id} and a.gmt_create is not null group by t.id
